name: Contra: Shattered Soldier
description: Contra Shattered Soldier brings classic, fast-paced shooting action to the Plastation 2 computer entertainment system.  As an unknown alien army invades the earth, Bill Rizer and his partner Lucia blast through intense firefights in an attempt to stop the invasion and save the human race.  With non-stop action, advanced weaponry and hordes of nasty aliens, Contra Shattered Soldier blows the lid off of traditional action games!
